vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σάρρα, -ας, ἡ (Heb. שָׂרָה, Gen.17:15),
Sarah: Rom.4:19 9:9, Heb.11:11, 1Pe.3:6.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.29;
daughter of: Terah (H8646);
sister of: Abraham (H0085), Nahor (H5152H) and Haran (H2039); married to Abraham (H0085);
mother of: Isaac (H3327); also called Sarai at Gen.11.29,30,31; 12.5,11,17; 16.1,2,3,5,6,8; 17.15;
§ Sarah, "princess"
Sara, Sarah, (Proper name), the wife of Abraham, Rom. 4:19; 9:9; Heb. 11:11; 1Pet. 3:6*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒拉 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來字的意思是 "公主"
亞伯拉罕的妻子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒拉 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来字的意思是 "公主"
亚伯拉罕的妻子
